alert.note: Alert for Christian; Douglas; Greene; Webster (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 12 at 4:45AM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Webster, northwestern Douglas, eastern Christian and southeastern Greene Counties through 530 AM CDT... At 445 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Ozark, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Nixa, Ozark, Rogersville, Seymour, Sparta, Highlandville, Fremont Hills, Fordland, Duncan, Diggins, Oldfield, Elkhead, Bruner, Selmore, Keltner, Northview, Christian Center, Chadwick, Linden and Dogwood. This includes Interstate 44 near mile marker 96. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will relay your report to the National Weather Service office in Springfield.
